title: Indonesia plans to punish nickel park for alleged breaches
body: Environmental violations have been found at the Indonesia Morowali Industrial Park, according to the Ministry of Environment.

title: Indonesia revokes nickel mining permits at top diving spot
body: It has cancelled four out of five nickel mining permits in Raja Ampat, one of the country’s most prized diving and snorkelling destinations.

title: Indonesia nickel firm Ceria Nugraha plans capacity expansion
body: Ceria's new furnace has the capacity to produce 63,200 metric tons of ferronickel annually.

title: Indonesia halts mine near dive hotspot on tourism concern
body: The mine in the Raja Ampat archipelago will be halted while the government investigates its impact on the area.

title: Indonesian nickel miners working to launch local metal exchange in 2026
body: Since 2020, the government has banned exports of nickel ore to attract investment in smelting.

title: Indonesia sovereign wealth funds, Eramet to create nickel investment platform
body: Eramet is expected to provide technical expertise on mining.

title: Freeport Indonesia says Manyar smelter resumes operations after fire
body: The miner said its $3.7 billion copper smelter has resumed operations earlier than anticipated.

title: Indonesian state miner Antam seeks $500 million syndicated loan
body: It would be the country’s first syndicated dollar borrowing from a state-owned enterprise this year.

title: Indonesian coal shipments to China slide amid new benchmark push
body: Domestic prices are at four-year lows, cutting into profit for imported coal.

title: Landslide at gold mine in Indonesia’s Papua kills six; 14 missing
body: Authorities will resume on Tuesday their search for those missing after the disaster.
